name: Evil Hand
description:
A short game about bloody family reunion. 

Ranked #1 in 'Movie interpretation' for amazing MovieGameJam.

You got quite attached to your body and don't want to lose that bond. So you need to reintegrate it.. But it is fiercely fighting back and you gotta to choke it a little bit beforehand. 

Thanks to demonic immortality you can't die and have unlimited attempts to perform a cozy family hug.

Controls

  • WASD or Arrow keys for movement
  • HOLD Spacebar near a neck of the enemy to choke him
  • Any key to skip intro

Playthrough of the game.

Game made in 10 days for MovieGameJam (goal was to create a project inspired by your favorite movie scene).
Check out other entries - there are a lot of groovy games.
